name: Rintsunaji Koma One - Demo (Pre-Alpha)
description:
The Project
The first game in my Rintsunaji Koma series. It's full name is currently
The Original Rintsunaji Koma Classic One: Too Many Bad Ideas - A look at the inside of the developers' mindscape, and an example of what someone with very little income, some cool friends, a bit of passion, and internet access can accomplish. Yes, this is also part of the title. However, the title will probably change slightly over time if parts of it become inaccurate for any reason.

Current Version: 0.0.2.0
Rintsunaji Koma Team
that girl - Primary Developer
Gemakai - Lead Artist & Character Designer
xa44 - Icon Artist

More information on my Patreon
